meanings.sent1: The interparty agreement was signed by both groups.
meanings.sent2: The interparty communication was essential for resolving the conflict.
meanings.sent3: The interparty picnic brought together members from different teams.
meanings.sent4: The interparty bridge connected the two sides of the river.
meanings.sent5: The interparty relationship was built on trust and cooperation.

meanings.definition: Involving or relating to different political parties.
meanings.sent1: The interparty debate highlighted contrasting views.
meanings.sent2: The interparty negotiations aimed to find common ground.
meanings.sent3: The interparty rivalry added excitement to the election.
meanings.sent4: The interparty alliance surprised many political analysts.
meanings.sent5: The interparty dynamics shaped the outcome of the election.
